mapper.update: update sys_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_info = #{userInfo}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=BLOB}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name as "sysUser.userName", u.user_email as "sysUser.userEmail" from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.id = #{userId}

select r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name as "sysUser.userName", u.user_email as "sysUser.userEmail" from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.id=#{userId} and r.enabled=#{enabled}
